examples.translation: Do you shave your arms regularly?

glosses: (of a man) to marry a woman

examples.translation: Whoever ends up marrying me will be very lucky.

glosses: to take as a wife to usually one's son

examples.text: güzel kızlara "seni oğluma alayım mı?" diyen teyze
examples.translation: aunties that ask beautiful girls "would you like to be my daughter-in-law, hm, what do you say?"

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish آلمق, from Proto-Turkic *al- (“to take”).
